Facilitated daily stand-ups and sprint planning in Agile environment
Developed HR chatbot using Python, Django, and Dialogflow for 500k+ employees
Implemented feedback mechanisms using PostgreSQL for user behavior analysis
Created automation tool reducing bot creation time by 90%
